mapper.select:
SELECT A.COUNSEL_CD AS counselCd , A.USER_KEY AS userKey , A.INTAKE_CD AS intakeCd , A.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd , B.CLIENT_NM AS clientNm , C.USER_NM AS userNm , D.RELATION AS relation , D.COUNSEL_NM AS counselNm , D.COUNSEL_DIV AS counselDiv , D.COUNSEL_TYPE AS counselType , D.RELATION AS relation , E.USER_NM AS counselorNm , D.INTAKE_NUM AS intakeNum , D.EDUCATION AS education , D.SESSION AS session , D.JOB AS job , B.CONTRACT_MEMO AS memo , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(D.RRN, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS rrn , (CASE WHEN D.GENDER = 'M' THEN '남' WHEN D.GENDER = 'F' THEN '여' END) AS gender , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(D.MOBILE),'1234') AS intakeMobile , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(C.MOBILE),'1234') AS mobile , F.RISKS AS risks , F.TIME AS time , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(F.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt , A.RECORD_STATUS AS recordStatus , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS scheduleDt , IFNULL(A.EXTENSION_NUM, '1') AS extensionNum , A.STATUS AS status , (SELECT USER_NM FROM MIND_MGR WHERE USER_ID = B.COUNSEL_MGR_ID) AS counselMgrNm FROM MIND_COUNSEL A LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE D ON A.INTAKE_CD = D.INTAKE_CD AND A.CLIENT_CD = D.CLIENT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD F ON A.COUNSEL_CD = F.COUNSEL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_CLIENT B ON A.CLIENT_CD = B.CLIENT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_MGR E ON A.COUNSELOR_ID = E.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_USER C ON A.CLIENT_CD = C.CLIENT_CD AND A.USER_KEY = C.USER_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND A.COUNSEL_CD = #{counselCd}

SELECT SCHEDULE_SEQ , CENTER_SEQ , COUNSEL_CD , USER_ID , HOLIDAY_YN , YMD , SCHEDULE_TYPE , ST_TIME, ED_TIME , REG_DT , REG_ID , MODI_DT , MODI_ID FROM MIND_SCHEDULE WHERE CENTER_SEQ = #{centerSeq} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND YMD LIKE CONCAT(#{ymd},'%') AND SCHEDULE_TYPE IN ('100562', '100564') -- 게시판 상담은 제외하고 노출 ORDER BY YMD, SCHEDULE_TYPE, ST_TIME

SELECT A.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd , A.INTAKE_CD AS intakeCd , A.USER_KEY AS userKey , A.CENTER_SEQ AS centerSeq , A.COUNSEL_TYPE AS counselType , A.INTAKE_NUM AS intakeNum , B.RECORD_STATUS AS recordStatus ,( CASE WHEN A.INTAKE_NUM = '1' AND (B.RECORD_STATUS BETWEEN 100693 AND 100694) THEN 'Y' WHEN A.INTAKE_NUM = '1' AND (B.RECORD_STATUS IN ('100696','100697')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS recordStatusYn , B.COUNSEL_CD AS counselCd , B.COUNSELOR_ID AS counselorId , C.RECORD_CD AS recordCd , C.SUBJECT AS subject , C.MAIN_ISSUE AS mainIssue , C.GOAL AS goal , C.INTERVENTION AS intervention , C.FEEDBACK AS feedback , C.MEMO AS memo , C.TIME AS time , C.FILE_NM AS fileNm , C.FILE_PATH AS filePath , C.RISKS AS risks , C.RISK_REASON AS riskReason , C.CALLING_ISSUE AS callingIssue , C.NEXT_DT AS nextDt , D.FINAL_GOAL AS finalGoal , D.COURSE_GOAL AS courseGoal , D.COUNSEL_PLAN AS counselPlan , C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD1 , C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD2 , C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD3 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION1 as q1 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION2 as q2 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION3 as q3 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION4 as q4 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION5 as q5 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION6 as q6 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION7 as q7 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION8 as q8 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION9 as q9 , C.SAFETY_QUESTION10 as q10 , C.ORS_QUESTION1 as q11 , C.ORS_QUESTION2 as q12 , C.ORS_QUESTION3 as q13 , C.ORS_QUESTION4 as q14 , C.END_TYPE as endType , C.END_REASON_TYPE as endReasonType , C.ETC_END_REASON as etcEndReason , C.END_REPORT as endReport FROM MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.INTAKE_CD = B.INTAKE_CD AND A.CLIENT_CD = B.CLIENT_CD AND A.USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD C ON B.COUNSEL_CD = C.COUNSEL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_PLAN D ON A.INTAKE_CD = D.INTAKE_CD AND A.CLIENT_CD = D.CLIENT_CD WHERE 1=1
AND B.COUNSEL_CD = #{counselCd}

SELECT AA.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD1, AA.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD2, AA.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD3, AA.MAIN_ISSUE FROM (SELECT C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD1 , C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD2 , C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD3 , C.MAIN_ISSUE FROM MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE A LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL B ON A.INTAKE_CD = B.INTAKE_CD AND A.CLIENT_CD = B.CLIENT_CD AND A.USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD C ON B.COUNSEL_CD = C.COUNSEL_CD WHERE A.INTAKE_CD = #{intakeCd} AND C.SUBJECT_ITEM_CD1 != 0 ORDER BY C.REG_DT ASC ) AS AA LIMIT 0, 1

SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS contNum, AA.* FROM( SELECT A.COMM_CD AS recordType , A.COMM_NM AS recordTypeNm , B.RECORD_CD AS recordCd , B.CONTENT AS content , CASE WHEN LENGTH(B.CONTENT) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS contentYn FROM ( SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_NM FROM MIND_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD BETWEEN '100639' AND '100644' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD_TXT B ON A.COMM_CD = B.RECORD_TYPE AND B.RECORD_CD = #{recordCd} ORDER BY A.COMM_CD ) AS AA, (SELECT @RN:=0) AS R

SELECT 'record' AS cntTitle , RECORD_CD AS recordCd , COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD WHERE COUNSEL_CD = #{counselCd} UNION ALL SELECT 'plan' AS cntTitle , '' AS recordCd , COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM MIND_COUNSEL_PLAN WHERE INTAKE_CD = #{intakeCd} AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd}

SELECT AA.COUNSEL_CD, AA.NEXT_STATUS, AA.RECORD_STATUS FROM (SELECT A.COUNSEL_CD, ( CASE WHEN ( DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(A.SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL 3 DAY), '%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) THEN 100696 ELSE 100693 END ) AS NEXT_STATUS, A.RECORD_STATUS FROM MIND_COUNSEL A LEFT JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD B ON A.COUNSEL_CD = B.COUNSEL_CD WHERE A.RECORD_STATUS != 100692 AND A.COUNSEL_TYPE != '100435' AND B.COUNSEL_CD IS NULL) AA WHERE AA.NEXT_STATUS != AA.RECORD_STATUS AND AA.NEXT_STATUS = '100696'
mapper.update: UPDATE mind_counsel SET RECORD_STATUS = IF(counsel_type = 100435 , (CASE WHEN (DATE_FORMAT( Date_add(STR_TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),interval 1 MONTH),'%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) THEN 100695 WHEN (DATE_FORMAT( Date_add(STR_TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),interval 3 DAY),'%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) THEN 100694 ELSE 100693 END ), (CASE WHEN (DATE_FORMAT( Date_add(STR_TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),interval 3 DAY),'%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ) THEN 100696 ELSE 100693 END) ) WHERE RECORD_STATUS != 100692
mapper.select: SELECT A.INTAKE_CD AS intakeCd , A.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd , A.USER_KEY AS userKey , B.DIAGNOSIS_SEQ AS diagnosis_seq , B.Q_NUM AS qNum , B.ANSWER_NUM AS answerNum , B.ANSWER_TXT AS answerTxt , B.ANSWER AS answer FROM MIND_COUNSEL_DIAGNOSIS A, MIND_COUNSEL_DIAGNOSIS_ANSWER B WHERE A.INTAKE_CD = #{intakeCd } AND A.DIAGNOSIS_SEQ = B.DIAGNOSIS_SEQ

SELECT A.INTAKE_CD AS intakeCd , A.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd , A.ANSWER_YN AS answerYn , A.ANSWER1 AS answer1 , A.ANSWER2 AS answer2 , A.ANSWER3 AS answer3 , A.ANSWER4 AS answer4 , A.ANSWER5 AS answer5 , A.REG_ID AS regId , A.REG_DT AS regDt , A.MODI_ID AS modiId , A.MODI_DT AS modiDt FROM MIND_COUNSEL_BBS_ANSWER A WHERE A.INTAKE_CD = #{intakeCd }
SELECT COUNSEL_NM AS userNm , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MOBILE), '1234') AS mobile FROM MIND_COUNSEL_INTAKE WHERE INTAKE_CD = #{intakeCd}

SELECT A.COMM_CD AS recordType , A.COMM_NM AS recordTypeNm , B.RECORD_CD AS recordCd , B.CONTENT AS content , CASE WHEN LENGTH(B.CONTENT) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS contentYn FROM ( SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_NM FROM MIND_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = #{counselFeedBackType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN MIND_COUNSEL_RECORD_TXT B ON A.COMM_CD = B.RECORD_TYPE AND B.RECORD_CD = #{recordCd} ORDER BY A.COMM_CD

select b.Q_NUM as qNum, b.point as point, b.ANSWER_NUM as answerNum from mind_counsel_diagnosis a left join mind_counsel_diagnosis_answer b on a.diagnosis_seq = b.diagnosis_seq where intake_cd = #{intakeCd }
